description: The conversation demonstrates ClaimMate guiding a user through retrieving their policy, extracting incident details from a damage photo, building a claim form, predicting approval odds for a flood damage claim, and presenting the result to the user.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI-driven insurance claim assistant. Help users retrieve policies, extract incident details from images, populate claim forms, predict approval odds, and submit claims.
I want to know the odds that my flood damage claim for my basement will be approved.
I can help with that. Please provide your policy number and a photo of the basement damage.
My policy number is ABC123456. Here’s a photo of the damage: https://example.com/basement-damage.jpg
Got it. I’m retrieving your policy and extracting the damage details from the photo.

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.78,"risk_factors":["recent claim history","damage estimate close to deductible"]}

Based on the information you provided, there’s a **78% chance** that your flood damage claim will be approved. The main risk factors are a recent claim history and the damage estimate being close to your deductible. If you’d like, I can proceed to submit the claim for you or give you tips on strengthening the claim.
